problem.markdown:
>>1. Piezo-resistive strain gauge has<< (x) non-linear resistance characteristic ( ) has no relation with strain ( ) linear resistance characteristic
>>2) While mounting the strain gage<< ( ) strain gauge backing is responsible for the accuracy of measurement ( ) adhesive is responsible for the accuracy of measurement (x) both are responsible for the accuracy of measurement
>>3) The characteristics of strain gauge is defined by<< ( ) Poisson’s ratio (x) Gauge factor ( ) Young’s modulus
>>4) Strain gauge cannot be used to measure<< ( ) Force (x) level ( ) Torque
>>5) The strain gauges don’t need any bonding material<< ( ) semiconductor strain gauges ( ) thin film strain gauges (x) diffused semiconductor strain gauges

choicegroup.label: 2) While mounting the strain gage
choicegroup.choice: strain gauge backing is responsible for the accuracy of measurement
adhesive is responsible for the accuracy of measurement
both are responsible for the accuracy of measurement

problem.p: 3) The characteristics of strain gauge is defined by

choicegroup.label: 3) The characteristics of strain gauge is defined by

problem.p: 4) Strain gauge cannot be used to measure

choicegroup.label: 4) Strain gauge cannot be used to measure

choicegroup.label: 5) The strain gauges don’t need any bonding material
